Uses of Interface
com.appglu.UserOperations

Packages that use UserOperations
com.appglu The main package of AppGlu's Java Client SDK.
Contain interfaces to describe all available operations and APIs as well as model objects to be used by these operations. 
com.appglu.android The main package of AppGlu's Android SDK.
Contains the SDK's main class AppGlu and some utility classes to provide asynchronous execution using AsyncTask. 
com.appglu.impl Contain the implementation of interfaces and private objects only to be used internally.

Uses of UserOperations in com.appglu.android
 

Classes in com.appglu.android that implement UserOperations

          UserApi has methods to login / logout and sign up new mobile app users.
